mapper.select: select r.reno reno, r.bono bono, r.mno mno, m.mname mname, r.recontents recontents, r.redate redate from reply as r inner join member as m on r.mno = m.mno where r.bono=#{bono} order by reno asc
select count(*) from reply where bono=#{bono}
mapper.update: update reply set recontents = #{recontents} where reno = #{reno}
